    add_cron_alpha()
    Add Cronbach's Alpha to a multiverse pipeline
    add_filters()
    Add filtering/exclusion criteria to a multiverse pipeline
    add_model()
    Add a model and formula to a multiverese pipeline
    add_postprocess()
    Add arbitrary postprocessing code to a multiverse pipeline
    add_preprocess()
    Add arbitrary preprocessing code to a multiverse analysis pipeline
    add_summary_stats()
    Add a set of descriptiove statistics to compute over a set of variables
    add_variables()
    Add a set of variable alternatives to a multiverse pipeline
    combine_all_grids()
    Combine grids of analysis decisions into a single tibble

    Title

    Title
    create_filter_grid()

    create_model_grid()
    Create a modeling grid
    create_postprocess()
    Add arbitrary post hoc code to execute after each analysis
    create_preprocess()
    Add arbitrary pre-processing code to execute after data are filtered (but before analysis)
    create_var_grid()
    Create a grid of all combinations of variables
    expand_decisions()
    Expand a set of multiverse decisions into all possible combinations
    report_universe_console()
    Create a 'universe' console report
    run_multiverse()
    Run a multiverse based on a complete decision grid
    run_universe_model()
    Run a single set of arbitrary decisions and save the result
    run_universe_summary_stats()
    Compute summary statistics for a single decision set
